DOC.brief_summary: The purpose trial determine whether provide non-contracepting woman gonorrhea chlamydial infection advance provision emergency contraception ( APEC ) condoms decrease risk become pregnant .
DOC.brief_title: Randomized Trial Advanced Provision Emergency Contraception Among Women With Gonorrhea Chlamydia
DOC.criteria: Noncontracepting woman > 15 year age report Public Health Seattle & King County diagnosis gonorrhea chlamydial infection interview public health staff purpose partner notification Use effective contraception ( hormonal contraception , IUD , diaphragm ) ; sex one partner precede 60 day status post vasectomy ; age < 15 ; inability speak English ; history tubal ligation , hysterectomy , menopause .
